trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKMB118_04397_SEQ_00<tab>The watcher would have you deal with the specters haunting the moon.
TEXT_AKTKMB118_04397_TODO_00<tab>Speak with the faded spirit.
TEXT_AKTKMB118_04397_TODO_01<tab>Speak with the dreaming spirit.
TEXT_AKTKMB118_04397_TODO_02<tab>Speak with the forlorn spirit.
TEXT_AKTKMB118_04397_TODO_03<tab>Speak with the somber spirit.
TEXT_AKTKMB118_04397_TODO_04<tab>Approach the lustrous dog and follow its lead.
TEXT_AKTKMB118_04397_TODO_05<tab>Speak with the temperamental spirit.
TEXT_AKTKMB118_04397_TODO_06<tab>Speak with the temperamental spirit again.
TEXT_AKTKMB118_04397_TODO_07<tab>Approach the lustrous dog and follow its lead.
TEXT_AKTKMB118_04397_TODO_08<tab>Speak with the anguished spirit.
TEXT_AKTKMB118_04397_SHADOWONE4397_100_000<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>From endless dreams...I awake...<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_AKTKMB118_04397_WATCHEROFMOON_000_000<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>You must confront those lost souls, yes, but you need not expel them by might of arms...<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_AKTKMB118_04397_WATCHEROFMOON_000_001<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>A feather-touch, a firm word─simple methods may send them away, faint echoes as they are.<var 48 01 /var>

TEXT_AKTKMB118_04397_WATCHEROFMOON_000_002<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Ware the strength of sentiment that drives them, however. Emotions that do not fade even with the passage of centuries...<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_AKTKMB118_04397_WATCHEROFMOON_000_003<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>And make haste. Though yet distant, unwelcome guests draw closer...<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_AKTKMB118_04397_WATCHEROFMOON_000_010<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Of the six elemental brands, only those of levin and wind are intact.<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_AKTKMB118_04397_WATCHEROFMOON_000_011<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>If the other brands are not reforged, Zodiark may yet be freed.<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_AKTKMB118_04397_WATCHEROFMOON_000_012<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Find the spirits of the sacrificed, and do what must be done...<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_AKTKMB118_04397_SHADOWTWO4397_000_015<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>...Awaken? Is it...is it time...?<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_AKTKMB118_04397_SHADOWTHREE4397_000_020<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>I was... We were...<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_AKTKMB118_04397_SHADOWFOUR4397_000_025<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Those halcyon days...<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_AKTKMB118_04397_SHADOWONE4397_000_030<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Where...when... How long...?<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_AKTKMB118_04397_SHADOWTWO4397_000_040<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Was it truly...so long ago...?<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_AKTKMB118_04397_SHADOWTHREE4397_000_050<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>We were happy... At peace with the star.<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_AKTKMB118_04397_SHADOWTHREE4397_000_051<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>We nurtured it. Helped it grow. With our will, our creations...<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_AKTKMB118_04397_SHADOWFOUR4397_000_060<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>We were the star's beating heart. Its life...<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_AKTKMB118_04397_SHADOWFOUR4397_000_061<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Every soul a drop of blood flowing through its veins...<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_AKTKMB118_04397_SHADOWFOUR4397_000_062<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>To live. To learn, to create...to make better.<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_AKTKMB118_04397_SHADOWFOUR4397_000_063<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>The star flourished...as did we.<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_AKTKMB118_04397_SHADOWFOUR4397_000_064<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Do you remember...?<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_AKTKMB118_04397_SYSTEM_000_065<tab>As the whispers die, the final spirit fades. No shadows of times long lost remain around the Drowning Brand.
TEXT_AKTKMB118_04397_SYSTEM_000_066<tab>An unusually lustrous dog is gazing at you with what seems to be fond anticipation.
TEXT_AKTKMB118_04397_SYSTEM_000_067<tab>It appears to be waiting for you to follow it.
TEXT_AKTKMB118_04397_SHADOWFIVE4397_000_070<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>These...blackened memories...<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_AKTKMB118_04397_SYSTEM_000_080<tab>Follow the lustrous dog and try not to fall behind.
TEXT_AKTKMB118_04397_SYSTEM_000_081<tab>The dog silently regards the spirit that lurks near the brand.
TEXT_AKTKMB118_04397_SYSTEM_000_090<tab>Perhaps the dog will let you pet it once you have dealt with the lingering spirit.
TEXT_AKTKMB118_04397_SHADOWFIVE4397_000_100<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>We and the star were fulfilled...<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_AKTKMB118_04397_SHADOWFIVE4397_000_101<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Wanted for naught, mourned for naught...<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_AKTKMB118_04397_SHADOWFIVE4397_000_102<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>So why... <var 1A 02 /var>Why<var 1A 01 /var> did it have to end!?<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_AKTKMB118_04397_POPMESSAGE_000_105<tab>The spirit's resentment takes form and lashes out!
TEXT_AKTKMB118_04397_SHADOWFIVE4397_000_110<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>The Final Days taught us to fear a death forced upon us.<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_AKTKMB118_04397_SHADOWFIVE4397_000_111<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>The injustice of duties and dreams left unfulfilled. The grief of unexpected partings...<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_AKTKMB118_04397_SHADOWFIVE4397_000_112<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Swift as darkness, cold as ash.<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_AKTKMB118_04397_SHADOWFIVE4397_000_113<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Such tragedy, yet no catharsis! Such truth, yet no consolation...<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_AKTKMB118_04397_SYSTEM_000_114<tab>As the whispers die, the spirit fades. All is silent and still around the Numbing Brand.
TEXT_AKTKMB118_04397_ANCIENTSHADOWA_000_120<tab><var 48 F20223 /var>Oh, great Zodiark!<var 48 01 /var>
TEXT_AKTKMB118_04397_SYSTEM_000_130<tab>The lustrous dog is once again staring at you expectantly, and who are you to deny it? Follow and try not to fall behind.
TEXT_AKTKMB118_04397_SYSTEM_000_131<tab>The dog silently regards the shadow that lurks near the brand.
TEXT_AKTKMB118_04397_SYSTEM_000_140<tab>The dog continues to focus on the shadow, as if to say, “Stop petting me and get on with it, please.”
